TextBlock.Text: NANOUK: Oeno discovered this device while mining at site 2b
ZAMIO: Fascinating, we have thought this system uninhabitated, that we were the first to come here but this just proves one came before us
NANOUK: Yes indeed, while this system is in its infancy, it clearly piqued the interest of another traveller, many years before
NANOUK: SIGH. It is times like this that I dearly miss our access to the Central Information Repository
NANOUK: Still, I'm not sure how much help it would be in this situation. Coleus took a look and said it is no language he ever saw
ZAMIO: That is fascinating, and am I right in thinking that even powered down it is emitting a signal?

NANOUK: Yes you are quite right! The waveform is rather spectacular, unlike any we have seen before. I plan to search for a signal of its frequency, there is nothing in this system, but perhaps further afield?
NANOUK: I fear I shall need a more powerful detector
NANOUK: But alas we must focus on the Ash Twin Project, and come back to this mystery another day!
ZAMIO: Well count me in as a member of your research team Nanouk, my curiostiy is certainly piqued by this latest mystery.
